General.Name: Nishi-Nippon Railroad Co. Ltd
General.Description: Nishi-Nippon Railroad Co., Ltd. engages in the transportation business in Japan and internationally. The company provides automobile, railway, air, and marine transportation services. It is also involved in selling and leasing real estate properties; and the provision of customs brokerage services. In addition, the company provides hotel administration services; and leisure facilities. Nishi-Nippon Railroad Co., Ltd. was founded in 1908 and is headquartered in Fukuoka City, Japan.
